meanings.sent1: The jar was unopenable, so I asked for help.
meanings.sent2: The unopenable lock prevented us from entering the room.
meanings.sent3: The unopenable box seemed to be hiding a secret treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt unopenable after the betrayal.
meanings.sent5: The unopenable door stood as a barrier to our escape.

meanings.sent1: The unopenable bottle was frustrating to deal with.
meanings.sent2: The jar was unopenable, no matter how hard we tried.
meanings.sent3: The unopenable safe held the most valuable possessions.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like an unopenable book, full of mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The unopenable gate guarded the entrance to the castle.
